<rule id="technology-usage-connect-01300" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <file filename="ra.xml"/>
                    <xmlfile matches="//*[local-name()='jms-jca-provider']"/>
                    <javaclass references="javax.resource.{*}">
                        <location>CONSTRUCTOR_CALL</location>
                        <location>IMPORT</location>
                        <location>INHERITANCE</location>
                        <location>METHOD_CALL</location>
                        <location>VARIABLE_DECLARATION</location>
                    </javaclass>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                 <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="JCA usage">
                    <description>JCA is used in the application</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-identified name="JCA">
                    <tag name="Connect"/>
                    <tag name="Other"/>
                    <tag name="Java EE"/>
                </technology-identified>
            </perform>
        </rule>
